text:
Hi everyone,

we have a project for more than one customer and suggesting a solution for them within a private App. The main question there would be if CRM Extension like in the BETA with showing content from other tools and build the cards with react will be sometime available also in public Apps?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview?uuid=908a9dd9-f58a-43b6-808f-9fd5f8f85c0d>

Or if not, is there a possibility to link or show content we create backend sides not only at Contacts and the standard Object in the public App CRM Cards but also at a Custom Object, which will be the same at all App-Users?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/crm-cards?uuid=0ee322eb-fe56-4f40-81f4-de6cff7fcacd>

:mega: PSA: CRM action components are now available in the record right sidebar! see <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components#crm-action-components|this dev doc> for the full list of available actions.
BEAUTIFUL! Massive update, we can finally actually clone side cards and keep it looking super consistent but with new functionality

I'm currently getting this error on all of my cards (that have been running fine until this morning), no errors in my terminal running the dev server, I have updated to 5.1.2 recently, but I did that after I initially saw things broken, any suggestions?
